title: Login with valid username and password
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using a correct username and password combination.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid username and corresponding password
Click the login button
Confirm user is authenticated and redirected to the main social feed

title: Login with invalid credentials
description: Ensure that login fails with incorrect username/password combinations and proper error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/password
Click the login button
Verify login failure and display of appropriate error notification

title: Login using Google OAuth
description: Validate that users can authenticate successfully through the Google OAuth integration.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click the Google Sign-In button
Complete the Google OAuth flow
Confirm successful authentication and access to authenticated user features

title: Create a text-only post
description: Verify users can create and share a post with only text content, which appears correctly on the feed.

steps.description: Navigate to post creation/editor
Enter text content into the post editor
Submit the post
Confirm the post appears in the social feed with correct text content

title: Create a post with media attachment
description: Ensure users can upload media (images), crop and resize them, and that the post displays correctly with media attached.

steps.description: Navigate to post creation/editor
Upload an image file
Crop and resize the image using the media upload tool
Add optional text content
Submit the post
Verify the post is displayed with the uploaded media rendered properly

title: Edit an existing post
description: Test that users can update the text or media of their own posts and the updates are reflected on the feed.

steps.description: Locate a user’s own post on their profile or feed
Click the edit option
Change text content and/or replace media
Save updates
Confirm the post updates are shown to all relevant feeds

title: Infinite scrolling on social feed
description: Validate that the social feed loads more posts correctly as the user scrolls down with no duplicates or broken content.

steps.description: Open the social feed page
Scroll to the bottom incrementally multiple times
Observe additional posts loading and append without errors
No duplicate or broken posts appear

title: Like a post with optimistic UI update
description: Verify that liking a post immediately updates the UI while backend confirmation is processed asynchronously.

steps.description: Locate a post in the feed
Click the like button
Like count increments immediately and the like button reflects selected state
Like is persisted after backend confirms operation

title: Bookmark and unbookmark a post
description: Test that users can bookmark posts and remove bookmarks, and that bookmarked posts appear correctly in the bookmarks area.

steps.description: Identify a post in the feed or profile
Click the bookmark button to save
Bookmark button shows active state
Navigate to bookmarks page
Confirm the post appears in user's bookmarks list
Remove bookmark from the post
Post is removed from bookmarks list and button state is updated

title: Send and receive real-time direct messages
description: Confirm that messages sent in a real-time chat are received immediately by the recipient with accurate message history.

steps.description: Open chat interface with an online user
Send a text message
Message appears instantly in sender chat window
Recipient receives and sees the message without delay
Verify message history loads correctly for both users

title: Display online presence indicators in chat
description: Verify that online/offline presence indicators for users update correctly in the messaging UI.

steps.description: Open the chat sidebar or conversation
Observe presence status of contacts while changing their online state (simulate offline/online)
Presence indicators update in real-time and reflect correct user status

title: Update profile details including avatar upload
description: Test that users can edit their profile information fields and upload a new avatar image successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile edit page
Change profile fields such as bio, display name, and location
Upload a new avatar image
Save changes
Profile updates are reflected in the profile page and feed displays updated avatar

title: Follow and unfollow users
description: Validate follower and following lists update correctly when users follow or unfollow other users.

steps.description: Visit a user profile
Click the follow button to follow the user
Following count and follower count update accordingly
Click the unfollow button to remove following
Following and follower counts update correctly again

title: Search for users and posts with paginated results
description: Check that the search functionality returns relevant users and posts with pagination handled properly.

steps.description: Navigate to search page
Enter a search query string
Submit the search
Results include relevant user profiles and posts
Scroll or click to next page of results
Additional results load without duplication or errors

title: Receive real-time notifications for likes, comments, and follows
description: Verify notifications are triggered in real-time on social interactions with accurate unread counts and are categorized correctly.

steps.description: Trigger social interactions targeting the user (like, comment, follow)
Notification center shows new notifications immediately
Unread counts increment correctly and are displayed prominently
Filter notifications by category (likes, comments, follows)
Notification filtering works and shows correct subset

title: Handle invalid media uploads during post creation
description: Ensure that invalid or unsupported media files are rejected with clear user feedback during post creation.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a media file with unsupported format or excessive size
An appropriate error message is displayed to user
The post cannot be submitted until valid media is uploaded or removed

title: Handle session expiration and redirect to login
description: Validate the app properly detects expired sessions and redirects users to the login page to reauthenticate.

steps.description: Authenticate and access protected areas
Simulate session expiration (token timeout or invalidation)
Attempt to perform an authenticated action or reload page
User is redirected to the login page

title: Performance test for server-side rendered home page load
description: Verify that the main social feed page loads within acceptable time limits with server-side rendering and caching enabled.

steps.description: Access the main feed page as an authenticated user
Page loads completely within defined performance thresholds

title: Verify optimistic UI rollback on like failure
description: Test that if the backend fails to register a like, the optimistic UI update reverts to the previous state with user notification.

steps.description: Simulate backend failure on like action
Click the like button on a post
Initially UI reflects liked state
After failure, UI reverts and shows error message

title: Ensure code quality linting enforcement
description: Check that the project’s TypeScript files pass ESLint and Prettier checks with no errors or warnings.

steps.description: Run ESLint and Prettier across the project codebase
No linting or formatting errors are reported
